structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
INTERCITY, INTERCOUNTY AND CITY-COUNTY COMPACTS FOR PURCHASING AND MERIT SYSTEMS -- RETIREMENT AND DISABILITY PLANS FOR EMPLOYEES OF COUNTIES AND CITIES

law.catch_line: Legal departments, courts and boards of education not affected.
law.text: KRS 79.010 to 79.060 shall not apply to the legal departments, courts, or boards of education, or their personnel, of any city or county that may enter into such a compact.
